name: Blood Moon (Dubiel)
description:
Repel incoming bloody moon. Or at least try to do it.

Survive as long as you can.

Tap or click the orb to cycle through elements.

Tap or click one of the towers to pass an element.

Match the elements with Blood Moons five eyes.

There are 1024 combinations of elements You can use.

Made for PolyCompo 1024.
